item.description:
Join us for this FREE introductory class and find out who the angels are, what angel communication is and how it can be used to deepen your own sense of self..  All we need do is listen – and once we’ve figured out how to do that, trust.  Trusting the guidance you receive is the next step in connecting with your angels and living a life based on unconditional love and inner truth.   Begin to more deeply trust what you already know.  Details on how to sign up for the series will also be provided!

 

Beginning Monday, February 20th there will be a 5 weeks series to talk about different angels and when there present. I look forward to hearing more about Michael, my most wonderful loving angel and guide! I really look ofrward to participating in this class series in person!!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Angel Communication, Free Intro class
